EXT_frag_depth.summary: The EXT_frag_depth extension is part of the WebGL API and enables to set a depth value of a fragment from within the fragment shader.

remarks.para: WebGL extensions are available using the method. For more information, see also Using Extensions in the WebGL tutorial.

blockquote.para: This extension is only available to {{domxref("WebGLRenderingContext", "WebGL1", "", 1)}} contexts. In {{domxref("WebGL2RenderingContext", "WebGL2", "", 1)}}, the functionality of this extension is available on the WebGL2 context by default. It requires GLSL #version 300 es.
